content: The standard extensions http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/questionnaire-minOccurs, http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/questionnaire-maxOccurs, http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/minValue and http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/maxValue seems buggy. Unless I throw them through Forge first, they make the igpublisher choke

eg:

validate res: StructureDefinition/maxValue                                       (00:11.0900)
Publishing Content Failed: Problem processing expression (%resource.kind = #39;.logical#39;. or element.first().path = %resource.type) and element.tail().all(path.startsWith(%resource.snapshot.element.first().path&'.')) in profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition path StructureDefinition.snapshot: Error in ?? at 1, 3: Found # expecting a token name (00:11.0907)
Whatâ€™s the difference for forge or not? it looks like an encoding issue to me?
